DOC.brief_summary: Incretin-based therapy show significant effect beyond glucose metabolism . We aim present study evaluate effect liraglutide several cardio-metabolic risk marker .
DOC.detailed_description: In detail , evaluate effect liraglutide carotid-intima medium thickness , oxidative stress , ghrelin , heat shock protein lipoprotein .
DOC.criteria: patient diagnosis type2 diabetes severe hepatic renal disease
